Usage: humanize.py <text> [--tone casual|professional|enthusiastic|blunt]

Transform AI-generated text into natural human-sounding prose.

Options:
  --tone casual|professional|enthusiastic|blunt  Set the tone (default: casual)

Examples:
  humanize.py "Furthermore, it is important to note that..."
  humanize.py "We are pleased to announce..." --tone enthusiastic

Usage: connection_tracker.py <command> [args]

Commands:
  add <name> [title] [company] [notes]  - Add connection
  update <name> <status>                - Update status (pending/connected/ignored)
  suggest                               - Show follow-up suggestions
  list [status]                         - List all connections

Usage: email_parser.py [email_text]

Parses forwarded LinkedIn notification emails.
If no email_text provided, reads from stdin.

Examples:
  email_parser.py "John wants to connect with you..."
  cat email.txt | email_parser.py

Usage: reminder_scheduler.py <command> [days]

Commands:
  schedule [days]  - Schedule reminders (default: every 3 days)
  remove           - Remove all LinkedIn reminders

Usage: task_manager.py <command> [args]

Commands:
  add <desc> [priority] [deadline] [context]  - Add a new task
  list [status] [sort_by]                     - List tasks (default: open, by priority)
  complete <task_id>                          - Mark task as complete
  delete <task_id>                            - Delete a task
  upcoming [hours]                            - Show upcoming deadlines

Examples:
  task_manager.py add "Fix bug" high 2024-12-31 "urgent"
  task_manager.py list all
No tasks found.
